actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make indemnity payments to farmers who have suffered crop depredation by migratory birds or other protected wildlife.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make indemnity payments to any farmer who establishes, to the satisfaction of the Secretary, that he has suffered crop depredation as a result of migratory birds or other protected wildlife. Prescribes the procedure for computation of the amount of the payments.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make indemnity payments to farmers who have suffered crop depredation by migratory birds or other protected wildlife.
